description:
The plan to predict the test questions is unable to produce success and Bunji`s kanji test ends in total defeat.  Mom studies with Bunji as she sets a low goal of "a least get a 20 out of a 100," but...; Mom has come to a hotel buffet with Daichi`s family and Chinatsu`s family.  Chinatsu`s mom is very easygoing toward the high spirited Bunji and Daichi who are rampaging about, but...; Mom has inadvertently cut Fumi`s bangs too short. Fumi is in a horrible mood and is still unhappy the next day when she is being taken to nursery school.  However, accidentally, Mom makes Fumi even angrier...; Bunji has caught a summer cold. The day after, when he`s supposed to take a day off, he heads to school with a runny nose and when he returns, he say he wants to go to the pool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fell Out / Animals / Bangs / Summer Notice
おちた / 動物 / まえがみ / 夏の知らせ
